name: Binary Bakers Blog
body:
### Swiftly convert!
You can convert to either Swift 2.3 or Swift 3 immediately. If you ever need to bring it back up, you can always navigate in Xcode to Edit > Convert > To Current Swift Syntaxâ€¦. The compiler fortunately shares the same smarts as the Migration Assistant as well. If you accidentally use the old API on a method call, the compiler will offer a Fix-It option that will help you use the correct modern API.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
